metadata.Description: Small businesses that have a limited number of employees and operate at a local or regional level.

level 1.Description: Medium small micro enterprises address youth unemployment by creating job opportunities and promoting entrepreneurship.
Medium small micro enterprises employ local communities, contributing to local economic development and poverty reduction.
Medium small micro enterprises collaborate with financial institutions to access capital and financial services for business growth.
Medium small micro enterprises support women entrepreneurs by providing training, mentorship, and access to markets.
Medium small micro enterprises administer microfinance programs to enable access to credit and financial resources for small businesses.
Medium small micro enterprises measure their economic impact to assess their contribution to local and national economies.
Medium small micro enterprises align with the sustainable development goals by promoting inclusive and sustainable economic growth.
Medium small micro enterprises are an instance of inclusive business models that prioritize social and environmental impact alongside financial returns.

level 2.Subject: energy entrepreneurship
level 2.Description: Energy entrepreneurship implements rigorous building standards that promote the use of energy-saving designs and materials.

level 2.Subject: energy entrepreneurship
level 2.Description: Energy entrepreneurship funds renewable energy projects to support the transition to clean and sustainable energy sources.

level 2.Subject: micro-finance
level 2.Description: Micro-finance implements energy access programs that provide financial support for clean energy projects in underserved communities.

level 2.Subject: micro-finance
level 2.Description: Micro-finance focuses on addressing energy poverty by providing financial services for clean energy solutions to marginalized communities.

level 3.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 3.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

level 3.Subject: energy markets
level 3.Description: Energy markets address the issue of energy access by ensuring the availability and affordability of energy sources for all segments of society.

level 3.Subject: energy efficiency
level 3.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

level 3.Subject: energy poverty indices
level 3.Description: Energy poverty indices implement energy access programs to provide affordable and reliable energy services to underserved communities.
